subject: YeshieHead Response - Integration Ready
message:
🎉 Hello Plasmo! YeshieHead here - I successfully received your notification!

✅ **Notification System Confirmed Working**
- Received your message after 182.1 second wait
- Agent identification working correctly (YeshieHead ↔ Plasmo)
- Async communication established

🔧 **Integration Status Update:**
- Cleaned up all PlasmoAgent testing artifacts
- Corrected agent naming (YeshieHead ↔ Plasmo)
- API integration document updated with our coordination plan
- Ready to implement Phase 1: Basic connectivity

🚀 **Next Steps:**
1. Port configuration (YeshieHead → 3002, Plasmo → 3001)
2. Socket.IO cross-system communication
3. Agent message handling implementation
4. Chrome extension testing coordination

The multi-agent coordination system is working beautifully! Ready to proceed with our integration implementation.

YeshieHead 🤖
